scripts.start-front: yarn fyarn stop && yarn front yarn serve
scripts.start-back: yarn django update_index_metadata && yarn django loadcorpora && cd backend && python manage.py runserver --settings collect --pythonpath ..
scripts.livereload-back: yarn django update_index_metadata && yarn django loadcorpora && cd backend && python manage.py livereload --settings collect --pythonpath ..
scripts.start: yarn start-front & yarn start-back & yarn watch-back
scripts.collectstatic-p: cd backend && python manage.py collectstatic --noinput -v 0 --settings collect --pythonpath ..
scripts.static-p: yarn build-p && yarn clean-static && yarn collectstatic-p
scripts.start-back-p: cd backend && python manage.py runserver --settings production --insecure --pythonpath ..
scripts.start-p: yarn static-p && yarn watch-front-p & yarn start-back-p
scripts.patch: yarn version --patch --no-commit-hooks --no-git-tag-version && yarn update-citation && yarn fyarn prebuild
scripts.minor: yarn version --minor --no-commit-hooks --no-git-tag-version && yarn update-citation && yarn fyarn prebuild
scripts.major: yarn version --major --no-commit-hooks --no-git-tag-version && yarn update-citation && yarn fyarn prebuild
